title: Did Pelosi ‘Remove’ Gender-Specific Words from Use in the House of Representatives?
subtitle: Right-leaning observers and commentators reacted angrily to proposals made by the Democratic House Speaker in January 2021. But what did she actually say?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In January 2021, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi and other Democrats proposed banning, eliminating, or removing gender-specific language from use in the U.S. House of Representatives.
